featured.title: What No One Tells You About Starting a Website in 2025
featured.description: Everyone says starting a website in 2025 is easier than ever. That’s true—on the surface. But here's what no one really tells you: the deeper challenges, mindset shifts, and hidden work behind every successful site.
featured.author: Alex Canvy
